title: MLW Fusion
resume: Major League Wrestling: FUSION is a weekly professional wrestling television series produced by Major League Wrestling® (MLW®) and created by Court Bauer. FUSION presents top ranked wrestlers clashing from around the world, creating a unique fusion of styles.
